text: Ara sedina amara pratyeka jatira madhye damra karaba tadera madhye theke tadera bisaye eka-ekajana saksi, ara tomake amara anaba ekajana saksirupe edera upare. Ara tomara kache amara abatarana karechi dharmagrantha saba bisayera suspasta byakhyasbarupa ara pathanirdesa o karuna ebam aâ€Œtmasamarpanakaridera jan'ya susambada-sbarupa.
